verses.verse: Brethren <S%G80><s%>, even if1437, 2532 a <S%G444>man<s%> be <S%G4301>overtaken<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> <S%G3900>trespass<s%>, <S%G5210>ye<s%> who <S%G3588>are<s%> <S%G4152>spiritual<s%>, <S%G2675>restore<s%> such a <S%G5108>one<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> a <S%G4151>spirit<s%> of <S%G4236>gentleness<s%>; <S%G4648>looking<s%> to <S%G4572>thyself<s%>, <S%G3361>lest<s%> <S%G4771>thou<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> be <S%G3985>tempted<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> a <S%G5100>man<s%> <S%G1380>thinketh<s%> himself to <S%G1511>be<s%> <S%G5100>something<s%> when he <S%G5607>is<s%> <S%G3367>nothing<s%>, he <S%G5422>deceiveth<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G1381>let<s%> each <S%G1538>man<s%> <S%G1381>prove<s%> his <S%G1438>own<s%> <S%G2041>work<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5119>then<s%> shall he <S%G2192>have<s%> his <S%G2745>glorying<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> regard of <S%G1438>himself<s%> <S%G3441>alone<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1519>of<s%> his <S%G2087>neighbor<s%>.

But <S%G2727>let<s%> him <S%G3588>that<s%> is <S%G2727>taught<s%> in the <S%G3056>word<s%> <S%G2841>communicate<s%> unto him <S%G3588>that<s%> <S%G2727>teacheth<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> good <S%G18>things<s%>.

For <S%G3754><s%> he <S%G3588>that<s%> <S%G4687>soweth<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G1438>his<s%> own <S%G4561>flesh<s%> <S%G2325>shall<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G4561>flesh<s%> <S%G2325>reap<s%> <S%G5356>corruption<s%>; <S%G1161>but<s%> he <S%G3588>that<s%> <S%G4687>soweth<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G2325>shall<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G2325>reap<s%> <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G2222>life<s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> let <S%G1573>us<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> be <S%G1573>weary<s%> <S%G2570>in<s%> <S%G4160>well-doing<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> in <S%G2398>due<s%> <S%G2540>season<s%> we shall <S%G2325>reap<s%>, if we <S%G1590>faint<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%>.

So <S%G3767>then<s%>, <S%G5613>as<s%> we <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G2540>opportunity<s%>, let us <S%G2038>work<s%> that which is <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G4314>toward<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1161>men<s%>, and <S%G3122>especially<s%> <S%G4314>toward<s%> them that <S%G3588>are<s%> of the <S%G3609>household<s%> of the <S%G4102>faith<s%>.
See <S%G1492><s%> with how <S%G4080>large<s%> <S%G1121>letters<s%> I <S%G1125>write<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%> with mine <S%G1699>own<s%> <S%G5495>hand<s%>.

As many <S%G3745>as<s%> <S%G2309>desire<s%> to make a fair <S%G2146>show<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4561>flesh<s%>, <S%G3778>they<s%> <S%G315>compel<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> to be <S%G4059>circumcised<s%>; <S%G3440>only<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> they <S%G3361>may<s%> not be <S%G1377>persecuted<s%> for the <S%G4716>cross<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G3761>not<s%> even <S%G3588>they<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> receive <S%G4059>circumcision<s%> do <S%G846>themselves<s%> <S%G5442>keep<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%>; <S%G235>but<s%> they <S%G2309>desire<s%> to <S%G4059>have<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G4059>circumcised<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> they may <S%G2744>glory<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5212>your<s%> <S%G4561>flesh<s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3361>far<s%> be it from <S%G1698>me<s%> <S%G1096>to<s%> <S%G1487>glory<s%>, <S%G3361>save<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4716>cross<s%> of <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>, <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> the <S%G2889>world<s%> hath been <S%G4717>crucified<s%> unto <S%G1698>me<s%>, and <S%G2504>I<s%> unto the <S%G2889>world<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> as many <S%G3745>as<s%> shall <S%G4748>walk<s%> by <S%G5129>this<s%> <S%G2583>rule<s%>, <S%G1515>peace<s%> be <S%G1909>upon<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1656>mercy<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> the <S%G2474>Israel<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>.
